## kod binary

## system szesnastkowy / heksadecymenalny
57 68 61 74 20 64 6f 20 6d 61 74 68 65 6d 61 74 69 63 69 61 6e 73 20 64 6f 20 69 6e 20 61 20 66 6f 72 65 73 74 3f 0a 54 68 65 79 20 63 6f 75 6e 74 20 6c 6f 67 73 2e

## UTF-8
What do mathematicians do in a forest?
They count logs.
